DOC.brief_summary: Tibial fixation weak link use soft tissue graft interference screw fixation bony tunnel ACL reconstruction . The Objective study two group patient undergo double loop hamstring autograft ACL reconstruction compare two tibial fixation device : taper Deltascrew Intrafix screw sheath .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Clinical Outcome ACL Reconstruction Utilizing Two Tibial Fixation Techniques , Concentric Tapered Interference Screws Interference Screw Sheath
DOC.criteria: Males female age 21 40 year . Primary ACL tear . Signed Informed consent . Availability follow period . Additional meniscal injury require suture . Articular cartilage injury require surgical management . Concomitant ligament injury knee require surgery . Bilateral ACL injury . Revision ACL surgery . Concurrent fracture low limb cause accident . Post operative wound infection . • Post operative nerve injury Cardiovascular compromise . Professional sport people . Soldiers active military service . Patients actively seek compensation injury . Patients research protocol . Patients receive medication alter bone metabolism : corticosteriods , Calcitonin , Flourides , Biphosphonates , Vitamin D derivative , Cytotoxic drug . Non compliance . • Pregnancy
